thread.title: A short visit in Paris. It was a wedding gift.
thread.title_full: A short visit in Paris. It was a wedding gift. - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mariaj832017
title: A short visit in Paris. It was a wedding gift.
text: The highlight of the place is the staff. Their service is absolutely outstanding. They are very nice and helpful. The hotel is located in a very quiet but still pretty central part of Paris (very close to Champs-Elysees).
